Consider the data we use here https://enufacas.github.io/Chained/agentops.html to build the recent workflow runs. I would like to more systematically represent the recent agent activity on the organism github page. I would like to see more of a 3d pipeline grid style layout where those agent within a run are building those PRs to accomplish those issues. Please also create a visual object for Missions please review available data here docs/DATA_STORAGE_LIFECYCLE.md be creative with the object types and allow filtering of the objects and selecting the object to jump to github links of issue, PR, etc...
title: Update organism page
